name: HomelessnessInterventionSNOMEDCT
title: Homelessness Intervention SNOMEDCT
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: <insert metadata>

The terms in this value set represent the interventions associated with Homelessness as identified by the Gravity Project),(Data Element Scope: Supports the exchange of data for the Gravity SDOH Clinical Care FHIR Implementation Guide as well as other uses of this SDOH terms),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes SNOMED CT interventions that have been identified through the Gravity Project community consensus voting process),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes social determinants of health general interventions used in multiple domains)
